47 template<class T>
48 template<typename... Args>
49 shm_ref<T> shm_ref<T>::create(const Args&... args) {
50  shm_ref<T> result;
51  result.construct(args...);
52  return result;
53 }
54 
55 template<class T>
56 bool shm_ref<T>::find() {
57  auto mem = vistle::shm<ObjData>::find(m_name);
58  m_d = mem;
59  ref();
60 
61  return valid();
62 }
63 
64 template<class T>
65 template<typename... Args>
66 void shm_ref<T>::construct(const Args&... args)
67 {
68  unref();
69  if (m_name.empty())
70  m_name = Shm::the().createObjectId();
71  m_d = shm<T>::construct(m_name)(args..., Shm::the().allocator());
72  ref();
73 }
74 
75 template<class T>
76 const shm_ref<T> &shm_ref<T>::operator=(const shm_ref<T> &rhs) {
77  unref();
78  m_name = rhs.m_name;
79  m_d = rhs.m_d;
80  ref();
81  return *this;
82 }
83 
84 template<class T>
85 const shm_ref<T> &shm_ref<T>::operator=(typename shm_ref<T>::ShmType *rhs) {
86  if (rhs == m_d)
87  return *this;
88 
89  unref();
90  if (rhs) {
91  m_name = rhs->getName();
92  m_d = rhs;
93  } else {
94  m_name.clear();
95  m_d = nullptr;
96  }
97  ref();
98  return *this;
99 }
100 
101 template<class T>
102 bool shm_ref<T>::valid() const {
103  return m_name.empty() || m_d;
104 }
105 
106 template<class T>
107 const typename shm_ref<T>::ShmType::Data *shm_ref<T>::getData() const {
108  if (!valid())
109  return nullptr;
110  return &*m_d;
111 }
112 
113 template<class T>
114 const shm_name_t &shm_ref<T>::name() const {
115  return m_name;
116 }
117 
118 template<class T>
119 void shm_ref<T>::ref() {
120  if (m_d) {
121  assert(m_name == m_d->name);
122  assert(m_d->refcount() >= 0);
123  m_d->ref();
124  }
125 }
126 
127 template<class T>
128 void shm_ref<T>::unref() {
129  if (m_d) {
130  assert(m_d->refcount() > 0);
131  m_d->unref();
132  }
133  m_d = nullptr;
134 }
135 
136 template<class T>
137 vistle::shm_ref<T>::operator bool() const {
138  return valid();
139 }
140 
141 template<class T>
142 template<class Archive>
143 void shm_ref<T>::save(Archive &ar) const {
144  ar & V_NAME(ar, "shm_name", m_name);
145  assert(valid());
146  if (m_d)
147  ar.saveObject(*this);
148 }
149 
150 template<class T>
151 template<class Archive>
152 void shm_ref<T>::load(Archive &ar) {
153  shm_name_t shmname;
154  ar & V_NAME(ar, "shm_name", shmname);
155  std::string arname = shmname;
156 
157  std::string name = ar.translateObjectName(arname);
158  //std::cerr << "shm_ref: loading " << arname << ", translates to " << name << std::endl;
159  m_name = name;
160 
161  unref();
162  m_d = nullptr;
163 
164  if (arname.empty() && m_name.empty())
165  return;
166 
167  auto obj = ar.currentObject();
168  auto handler = ar.objectCompletionHandler();
169  auto ref0 = Shm::the().getObjectFromName(name);
170  auto ref1 = T::as(ref0);
171  assert(ref0 || !ref1);
172  if (ref1) {
173  *this = ref1;
174  return;
175  }
176 
177  if (obj)
178  obj->unresolvedReference();
179  auto fetcher = ar.fetcher();
180  ref0 = ar.getObject(arname, [this, fetcher, arname, name, obj, handler](Object::const_ptr newobj) -> void {
181  //std::cerr << "object completion handler: " << name << std::endl;
182  assert(newobj);
183  auto ref2 = T::as(newobj);
184  assert(ref2);
185  *this = ref2;
186  m_name = newobj->getName();
187  if (fetcher)
188  fetcher->registerObjectNameTranslation(arname, m_name);
189 #if 0
190  auto ref2 = T::as(Shm::the().getObjectFromName(name));
191  assert(ref2);
192  *this = ref2;
193  if (ref2) {
194  m_name = ref2->getName();
195  ar.registerObjectNameTranslation(arname, m_name);
196  }
197 #endif
198  if (obj) {
199  obj->referenceResolved(handler);
200  }
201  });
202  ref1 = T::as(ref0);
203  assert(ref0 || !ref1);
204  if (ref1) {
205  m_name = ref1->getName();
206  ar.registerObjectNameTranslation(arname, m_name);
207  // object already present: don't mess with count of outstanding references
208  *this = ref1;
209  }
210 }
211 #endif

219 template<class T>
220 shm_array_ref<T>::shm_array_ref(const std::vector<typename T::value_type> &data)
221  : m_name(Shm::the().createArrayId())
222  , m_p(shm<T>::construct(m_name)(Shm::the().allocator()))
223  {
224  ref();
225  Shm::the().addArray(m_name, &*m_p);
226  (*this)->resize(data.size());
227  std::copy(data.begin(), data.end(), (*this)->begin());
228  }
229 
230 template<class T>
231 shm_array_ref<T>::shm_array_ref(const std::vector<typename T::value_type, vistle::default_init_allocator<typename T::value_type>> &data)
232  : m_name(Shm::the().createArrayId())
233  , m_p(shm<T>::construct(m_name)(Shm::the().allocator()))
234  {
235  ref();
236  Shm::the().addArray(m_name, &*m_p);

240 
241 template<class T>
242 shm_array_ref<T>::shm_array_ref(const typename T::value_type *data, size_t size)
243  : m_name(Shm::the().createArrayId())
244  , m_p(shm<T>::construct(m_name)(Shm::the().allocator()))
245  {
246  ref();
247  Shm::the().addArray(m_name, &*m_p);
248  (*this)->resize(size);
249  std::copy(data, data+size, (*this)->begin());
250  }
251 
252 template<class T>
253 template<class Archive>
254 void shm_array_ref<T>::save(Archive &ar) const {
255 
256  ar & V_NAME(ar, "shm_name", m_name);
257  ar.template saveArray<typename T::value_type>(*this);
258 }
259 
260 template<class T>
261 template<class Archive>
262 void shm_array_ref<T>::load(Archive &ar) {
263  shm_name_t shmname;
264  ar & V_NAME(ar, "shm_name", shmname);
265 
266  std::string arname = shmname.str();
267  std::string name = ar.translateArrayName(arname);
268  //std::cerr << "shm_array_ref: loading " << shmname << " for " << m_name << "/" << name << ", valid=" << valid() << std::endl;
269  if (name.empty() || m_name.str() != name) {
270  unref();
271  m_name.clear();
272  }
273 
274  ObjectData *obj = ar.currentObject();
275  if (obj) {
276  //std::cerr << "obj " << obj->name << ": unresolved: " << name << std::endl;
277  obj->unresolvedReference();
278  }
279 
280  auto handler = ar.objectCompletionHandler();
281  ar.template fetchArray<typename T::value_type>(arname, [this, obj, handler](const std::string &name) -> void {
282  auto ref = Shm::the().getArrayFromName<typename T::value_type>(name);
283  //std::cerr << "shm_array: array completion handler: " << arname << " -> " << name << "/" << m_name << ", ref=" << ref << std::endl;
284  if (!ref) {
285  std::cerr << "shm_array: NOT COMPLETE: array completion handler: " << name << ", ref=" << ref << std::endl;
286  }
287  assert(ref);
288  *this = ref;
289  if (obj) {
290  //std::cerr << "obj " << obj->name << ": RESOLVED: " << name << std::endl;
291  obj->referenceResolved(handler);
292  } else {
293  std::cerr << "shm_array RESOLVED: " << name << ", but no handler" << std::endl;
294  }
295  });
296  //std::cerr << "shm_array: first try: this=" << *this << ", ref=" << ref << std::endl;
297 }
298 
299 template<class T>
300 T &shm_array_ref<T>::operator*() {
301  return *m_p;
302 }

313 #else
314  return m_p.get();
315 #endif
316 }

324 #endif
325 }

327 template<class T>
328 int shm_array_ref<T>::refcount() const {
329  if (m_p)
330  return m_p->refcount();
331  return -1;
332 }
